reviewText: Well Demonstrated. And As StaTed Minimal Tools Needed. Figured Out Stock Requirements On Second Compass. could Have Been More Helpful With  Those Measuents. But Definitely A Great Resource!!!
Big fan of Peter Ross. He takes his time explaining ever step of the forging . I enjoy the research time that he puts in to his projects.

This is a really excellent smithing video that covers how to make a compass/divider tool. This is not a book for a beginning smith which (at least to me) smithing for woodworkers suggests. It's a great book for a jouneyman smith who can do some simply forge welding as well as basic forging. A better book for the woodworker who wants to learn smithing to make tools for woodworking would be the excellent Make Your Own Woodworking Tools: Metalwork Techniques to Create, Customize, and Sharpen in the Home Workshop Start with that instead if you are not already a smith.
